segments.text: Hello . I want to send the computer to my sister in Shanghai by logistics transport .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Is it in the box ? May I see it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . This is the computer and this is the keyboard and the monitor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are a mouse and a camera .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . How much is it to send these things to Shanghai by regular delivery ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It depends on the weight of these things . Generally speaking , we will charge you ten yuan for one kilogram .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Can you weigh them for me , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please go over there to weigh them .
segments.speaker: S2
